ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Major Achievements 1 12300 women were provided services of FST (Female Sterilization) under Family Planning intervention 2 40 men were provided services of MS (Male Sterilization) 3 2900 women were provided service to link with IUCD (Intra Uterine Contraceptive Device) 4 360 women were provided service to link with DMPA (Depot Medroxy Progesterone Acetate) 5 1150 women were provided service to link with OCP( Oral Contraceptive Pill) 6 2080 adults men and women were provided services of STD (Sexually Transmitted Decease) treatment and care 7 2500 population were provided health services through Health and Medical check up camps 8 12 clients were linked with Drug de Addiction Centre 9 1400 adults men and women were supported to HIV testing 10 520 adults Injecting Drug Users were provided Needle and Syringes (as per guidelines of NACO) to prevent HIV 11 1270 Scheduled Caste Children have been educated through NFE (Non formal Education) and Minimum Learning Level were built. 12 1180 Scheduled Caste Children were provided educational services through Remedial Coaching and Support Centers. 13 1700 Scheduled Caste women were supported and facilitated to form the SHGs and supported to run the SHGs with competencies of Micro-Finance and Micro Enterprises 14 1500 Scheduled Caste women have provided skill training in different trade to start the Micro Enterprises 15 1200 women were supported to link their products local Market 16 900 adults and youth were provided skill training in different trades i.e Terracotta Pottery, Spinning Cotton, Agarbatti making, Carpet Making, Detergent Powder Making, Tailoring, Paper Bags, Jute Bags etc. 17 250 adults and youth were provided Individual Income generation services i.e. Grocery Shop, Rickshaw Trolley, Piggery, Ducks etc.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Child Care Health Education employable scheme including school library coaching class cultural program sports activities children educational exposure and community meeting with children adolescent group and youth group school management committee etc.

The amount has been sanctioned for the purpose of well being of children in the project area 16 villages of block-Naugarh, district-Chandauli in Uttar Pradesh. We have utilized the money for the education of 2780 children between the age group 6 to 14 years . The children have improved their grade appropriate learning in mathematics, Hindi Language and English. Besides that we have provided Govt. developmental schemes and employable Skill Trainings for 300 youths.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: For promotion of child rights, an educational intervention is at present underway in 15 slums of Agra, the city famous for Taj Mahal. In each slum one primary education centre, named Nai Kiran (new ray) has been established to cater 450 Dalit and Muslim children, among whom over 80 per cent are girls. Classes are run throughout the year and joyful method of teaching is adopted in the schools. At the end of the year, the children are evaluateIt also organised a District Level Public Hearing to apprise the district officials about the real state of affairs prevailing at the village level. As a result of the public hearing, the process of registration and job card issuance hastened up.General health services were provided at the centre by male and female doctors and serious cases were referred to Fatehpur District Hospital. Pregnant women and children were specially provided all the services to ensure safe deliveries and immunisation of children in 0-1 year age group.MSS launched a campaign called Garima Abhiyan (campaign for self-respect) to wean away manual scavengers from their occupation and suitably rehabilitate them in respectable occupations.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Manav Vikas Parishad IS Established 14 August 1990 In malihabad Lucknow. Manav vikas Parishad is starting his work First time at Womans former Increase the Knowledge Level & living Status All the people is the main object at the Manav Vikas parishad . In the Present time Manav Vikas Parishad Doing the work with Utter Pradesh Aids control Society lucknow . On HIV/AIDS awareness and knowledge for the specific target group (HRG) last 18 Months bard wise House hold survey Project for the BPL card from DUDA (District Urban Development Authority) . We have done the people action for national integration (Pani) project April2006 to march 2007 In this project Identified the woman former by the Soceity for the increase them knowledge level We have done the Utter Pradesh Voluntary action network (UPVAN) Project . with the 55 district . In this project we had Aware the student and young Ager youth for the (Suchna ka Adhikar) Rule. We have done the National Environment Awareness program in 2004-05 with the Shohratgart Environmental Society Sidhdar nager (U.P.) We have done the child Development Kishori Shakti yojna in this project we had trained the girls in stitching , Mahendi, the work of Zari Zardozi, Handloom & handicraft work for the self depend them self in year 2004. At least 60 Candidate get the scholarship 400 per head by the smt shiri masood District programme officer (Barabanki) We had done the catholic Relief services (CRS) Project in the Lucknow District (U.P.) which we get reward from U.P. government .
